mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_item( point_item_no, point_item_name, point_item_type, point_item_content, point_item_price, point_item_stock, point_item_uniques, point_item_src, point_item_req_level ) VALUES( seq_point_item.nextval, #{pointItemName}, #{pointItemType}, #{pointItemContent}, #{pointItemPrice}, #{pointItemStock}, #{pointItemUniques}, #{pointItemSrc}, #{pointItemReqLevel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE point_item SET point_item_name = #{pointItemName}, point_item_type = #{pointItemType}, point_item_content = #{pointItemContent}, point_item_price = #{pointItemPrice}, point_item_stock = #{pointItemStock}, point_item_uniques = #{pointItemUniques}, point_item_src = #{pointItemSrc}, point_item_req_level = #{pointItemReqLevel} WHERE point_item_no = #{pointItemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT point_item_no as pointItemNo, point_item_name as pointItemName, point_item_type as pointItemType, point_item_content as pointItemContent, point_item_price as pointItemPrice, point_item_stock as pointItemStock, point_item_src as pointItemSrc, point_item_uniques as pointItemUniques, point_item_reg_date as pointItemRegDate, point_item_req_level as pointItemReqLevel FROM point_item ORDER BY point_item_no DESC
